articles.title: Greetings to Libyan Secretary of General People's Committee
articles.content:
Greetings to Libyan Secretary of General People's Committee
Pyongyang, March 15 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Il, premier of the DPRK, sent a congratulatory message to Al Baghdadi Ali Al Mahmoudi on Friday upon his reappointment as secretary of the General People's Committee of Libya.
					 The message wished the secretary greater success in his noble work for the development and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: World Organization Supports DPRK
articles.content:
World Organization Supports DPRK
 Pyongyang, March 15 (KCNA) -- A solidarity resolution on the Korean issue was adopted at the 3rd meeting of the Presidential Council of the World Federation of Trade Unions held in Cyprus on Mar. 8 and 9.
					 The resolution referred to the fact that the inter-Korean relations, which had vigorously advanced after the publication of the June 15 joint declaration, have encountered a grave challenge since the emergence of the pro-U.S. conservative regime in south Korea last year.
					
					 The United States has kept its aggression armed forces in south Korea for over six decades while hindering the reconciliation and unity of the Korean nation and the improvement of the inter-Korean relations, and it is aggravating the military tension day by day, persistently pursuing the hostile policy towards the Democratic People's Republic of Korea (DPRK), contrary to the trend of the times, it charged.
					
					 The U.S. is these days intensifying the war moves such as reinforcement and deployment of its armed forces around the Korean Peninsula, it pointed out, adding:
					
					 We scathingly denounce the hostile policy towards the DPRK of the U.S. which escalates the political and military tension and brings the dark clouds of war, going against the unanimous desire of the Korean nation and the trend of the times, and the anti-DPRK, anti-reunification moves of the south Korean conservative authorities following such policy.
					
					 We demand that the U.S. stop the anachronistic hostile moves against the DPRK at once, discontinue the military exercises and arms buildup causing a danger of war, replace the Korean Armistice Agreement with a peace accord and withdraw its troops from south Korea.
					
					 We strongly urge the south Korean conservative authorities to abandon their pro-American sycophancy and conception of hostility towards the fellow countrymen, faithfully implement the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration agreed and published by the north and south of Korea and positively come out in realizing the national reconciliation and unity in the idea of the "By the Korean nation itself."
					
					 Acknowledging that the Songun politics of the DPRK serves as a political mode deterring the reckless war moves for aggression of the U.S. and the south Korean conservative authorities and reliably guaranteeing peace and security in the Korean Peninsula and Northeast Asia and the world, we extend full support and solidarity to the workers and other people of the DPRK dynamically advancing towards the independent reunification, peace and prosperity.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Moves for Misleading Public Opinion Slammed
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Moves for Misleading Public Opinion Slammed
Pyongyang, March 15 (KCNA) -- The Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea Saturday issued its information bulletin No. 946 in denunciation of the south Korean puppet authorities who are resorting to base moves to mislead the public opinion at home and abroad, creating the impression that they are interested in improving inter-Korean relations.
					 Noting that the Lee Myung Bak group is these days working hard to build up public opinion on the issue of the inter-Korean dialogue, peddling it to other countries and international organization while talking nonsense that the group "respects" the inter-Korean agreements and calls for "resumption of open-hearted dialogue", the information bulletin said:
					
					 The "dialogue" ballad touted by the puppets is nothing but a despicable deceptive trick to cover up their crimes of totally bedeviling the inter-Korean relations and driving them to a crisis of military conflict and evade the blame for it.
					
					 The severance of dialogue and cooperation between the north and the south was entirely attributable to the Lee group which has denied the historic inter-Korean declarations and resorted to the moves for confrontation with the DPRK after it came to power.
					
					 The present puppet authorities of south Korea, steeped in the conception of confrontation with the DPRK to the marrow of their bones, were not interested in dialogue and cooperation between the north and the south at all from the outset. They have persistently blocked the dialogue and cooperation, openly blustering that there is "no need to have dialogue with the north".
					
					 It is the Lee group which has been mad about malignantly slandering the dignified socialist system of the DPRK and kicking up a ridiculous "human rights" racket. It is also none other than the south Korean puppets who are taking the lead in the moves to revile the DPRK's preparations for legitimate satellite launch.
					
					 It is preposterous for the Lee group of traitors to dare talk about "dialogue" as it has asserted "unification under the liberal democratic system" and is now bringing the dark clouds of war to hang over this land by introducing the U.S. aggression armed forces.
					
					 If the south Korean authorities are truly interested in the inter-Korean dialogue, they should apologize to the whole nation for their crimes of having bedeviled the inter-Korean relations and brought them to the brink of war through their moves for confrontation with the DPRK, drop their sinister anti-DPRK policy and stop all actions hostile towards the DPRK.

articles.title: Pullout of U.S. Troops and Resignation of "Government" Urged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Pullout of U.S. Troops and Resignation of "Government" Urged in S. Korea
Pyongyang, March 15 (KCNA) -- The Action Headquarters of the Youth and Students Solidarity for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration to Force the Lee Myung Bak Regime to Step Down in south Korea made public a statement on Mar. 12 in demand of the withdrawal of the U.S. troops from south Korea and the resignation of the puppet government.
					 Noting that the U.S. and the south Korean military authorities launched the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises for an invasion of the DPRK across south Korea, the statement said that this saber rattling is escalating the touch-and-go war crisis on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The statement stressed that it would be impossible to achieve the independent reunification, peace and prosperity of the nation if the U.S. regarding aggression and plunder as its mode of existence and the Lee Myung Bak "government" totally denying the inter-Korean declarations and getting hell-bent on the anti-DPRK war exercises are allowed to remain intact.
					
					 It declared that the action headquarters would vigorously struggle to drive the U.S. troops imposing misfortune and sufferings upon the Korean nation from south Korea and force the present "government" to step down.

articles.title: U.S.-S. Korean Joint War Games Slashed by Germans
articles.content:
U.S.-S. Korean Joint War Games Slashed by Germans
 Pyongyang, March 15 (KCNA) -- The German Branch of the Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain and the German Group for the Study of the Songun Politics issued a joint statement on March 11 in protest against the joint military exercises of the United States and the south Korean warmongers.
					 The statement branded the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises, staged by the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppets despite the DPRK's repeated warnings, as part of the war scenario for aggression aimed to ignite another Korean war.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists and the pro-American Lee Myung Bak puppet regime should be held entirely accountable for the escalated tense situation of the Korean Peninsula going to the brink of war, it said, and went on:
					
					 Those seeking to unleash a war can be defeated only by force of arms, not by words.
					
					 The March 9 statement of a spokesman for the General Staff of the Korean People's Army is a decisive and definite answer to the criminal war plan of the U.S. imperialists, the south Korean regime and the Japanese militarists.
					
					 The treasured sword of Songun will help defeat any aggressor forces and reliably defend the independence and dignity of Korea.
